scripts.build:dev: NODE_ENV=development bunx cap sync android && bunx cap copy android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.install:dev: adb devices | grep -q device || (echo '‚ùå No device found' && exit 1); adb install -r android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
scripts.dev:run: bun run build:dev && bun run install:dev
